name: Adventurer Legends
description:
A very exciting Diablo-like RPG Game with many random maps. Recruit excellent workers, run your shop well, lead your powerful HEROES and TEAMMATES to fight for Glory in the chaotic world!   

Play for FREE in this award-winning RPG game now! Start to make legendary equipment, sell them at a high price, equip them to strengthen your heroes and teammates and yourself. Collect TREASURES in adventure, and against the invasion.

The whole Shop is counting on you! Claim your Destiny Now!

  FEATURES:

  - Make kinds of equipment and run your own Shop. 
- Recruit excellent Workers to help the shop.
 - Take the Heroes to release powerful skills.
 - Lead the most faithful Teammate to fight for your glory. 
- Fight against millions of monsters in the chaotic world. 
- Forge powerful equipment for you & your heroes & teammates. 
- Defeat Monsters in the maps, get rare equipment ingredients totally for FREE!

  CONTACT US:

  If you have any problems or suggestions, please email us at al@wejoyworld.com.
